sn22.5:1.4: Mendicants are similarly enjoined to develop immersion (samādhi) in order to understand the six senses (SN 35.99, SN 35.160) and the four noble truths (SN 56.1).
sn22.5:3.3: “Relishing” (nandī) is a synonym of “craving” (taṇhā). Here it serves to show how the five aggregates participate in the process of generating one life after the next as depicted in dependent origination. Normally, craving in dependent origination is stimulated by the six senses.
